creditline: Gift of Don and Diana Lee Lucker
description: still life with plate with yellow apple, two frosted cakes, brown berries and an orange fruit, with leaves behind plate; small stemmed glass with pale yellow beverage at L
marks:
Signature and Date

See signed LRC, in black: [Raphaelle Peale Dec. 24 1821]
text: This is a ravishing still life by one of America's premier painters in that genre. As the inscription, "Raphaelle Peale Dec. 24 1821," and the depicted objects indicate, this was almost certainly painted as a Christmas present for someone close to the artist. The elements in the painting are all expensive delicacies: an apple, orange, hazelnuts, currants, Twelfth Night cakes, cinnamon bay leaves, and wine.
title: Still Life with Fruit, Cakes and Wine
